PowerShell Konferenz EU 2016
Hannover, Deutschland

20.04.2016 - 22.04.2016


Über

Welcome to the next great European PowerShell event!

After the discontinuation of the PowerShell Summit in Europe, we have partnered with powershell.de to be able to still have a European PowerShell event. We are still working on this site, so stay tuned for more information.

Referenten - Suche nach Rednern

If you wish to speak at PowerShell Conference Europe 2016, please send us a session abstract as soon as possible. For sessions to be delivered in German, please email a session abstract to tobias.weltner@email.de.

If you wish to submit a session to be delivered in English, please email a session abstract to ryan.yates@kilasuit.org.

When the final lineup of speakers are ready, a presentation of each speaker will be added to the site.

Veranstaltungsort

The conference will be held at the Hannover Congress Center. On day 1, we have the 'Beethoven Saal' for the keynote and one track. The second track will be held in the 'Blauer Saal'.
